storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to generate schedule reports to achieve visibility into planned activities and timelines

testCases.title: Generate schedule report with valid filters
preconditions: User is logged in as a Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule database contains test data with multiple projects, teams, and date ranges
Reporting system is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with filter options including date range, team, and project dropdowns

steps.action: Select a valid start date and end date from the date range picker (e.g., current month)
steps.expectedResult: Date range is populated in the filter fields without validation errors

steps.action: Select a valid team from the team filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter displays the selected team name and is accepted without errors

steps.action: Select a valid project from the project filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Project filter displays the selected project name and is accepted without errors

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to submit the report generation request
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report is generated and displayed within 5 seconds showing timelines, activities, and resource assignments matching the selected filters

steps.action: Verify the report contains accurate data for the selected date range, team, and project
steps.expectedResult: Report displays only activities within the specified date range, assigned to the selected team and project with correct timelines and resource information

postconditions: Schedule report is displayed on screen with filtered data
Report data matches the applied filters
System remains in ready state for additional operations (export, filter changes)
No errors are logged in the system

testCases.title: Export schedule report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in as a Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule report has been successfully generated with valid filters
Report is currently displayed on screen
Browser allows file downloads

steps.action: Generate schedule report by selecting valid date range, team, and project filters and clicking 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed on screen with complete schedule data including timelines and resource assignments

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF export process and displays export progress indicator

steps.action: Wait for PDF download to complete and open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded successfully with filename containing report name and timestamp, file opens correctly and contains all report data with proper formatting, headers, and footers

steps.action: Verify PDF content matches the on-screen report data
steps.expectedResult: PDF displays identical schedule information, timelines, resource assignments, and filter criteria as shown in the UI report

steps.action: Return to the displayed report and click the 'Export to Excel' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel export process and displays export progress indicator

steps.action: Wait for Excel download to complete and open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded successfully with filename containing report name and timestamp, file opens correctly in spreadsheet application

steps.action: Verify Excel content matches the on-screen report data and contains proper column headers
steps.expectedResult: Excel file displays identical schedule information in tabular format with proper column headers (Activity, Timeline, Resources, etc.) and all data matches the UI report

steps.action: Verify Excel file is editable and data can be manipulated
steps.expectedResult: Excel file allows data manipulation, sorting, and filtering as expected from a standard Excel workbook

postconditions: PDF file is saved to downloads folder with correct data
Excel file is saved to downloads folder with correct data
Both exported files contain accurate schedule report information
Original report remains displayed on screen
Export operations are logged successfully in the system

testCases.title: Verify real-time update of schedule report
preconditions: User is logged in as a Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule report is currently displayed for a specific project
User has access to backend system or test tools to modify schedule data
Real-time update mechanism is enabled in the system

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section and generate a report for a specific project with current date range
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed showing current schedule data including activities, timelines, and resource assignments for the selected project

steps.action: Note the current values displayed in the report (e.g., activity dates, resource names, timeline milestones)
steps.expectedResult: Current schedule data is clearly visible and documented for comparison

steps.action: Using backend access or test tools, update schedule data for the displayed project (e.g., change an activity date, modify resource assignment, or update timeline)
steps.expectedResult: Backend schedule data is successfully updated and saved in the schedule database

steps.action: Return to the displayed report UI and observe for automatic updates without manual refresh
steps.expectedResult: Report UI automatically detects the backend change and displays an update indicator or notification

steps.action: Wait up to 10 seconds and monitor the report display
steps.expectedResult: Report UI updates automatically within 10 seconds showing the modified schedule data without requiring manual page refresh

steps.action: Verify the updated data is accurately reflected in the report by comparing with the backend changes made
steps.expectedResult: Report shows the latest schedule information matching exactly with the backend updates (updated activity dates, modified resource assignments, or changed timelines)

steps.action: Verify that only the changed data is updated while other report elements remain unchanged
steps.expectedResult: Only the modified schedule elements are updated in the report; all other data remains consistent and unchanged

postconditions: Report displays the most current schedule information
Real-time update mechanism is functioning correctly
Updated data matches backend schedule database
No data inconsistencies or display errors are present
System logs show successful real-time synchronization

storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to filter schedule reports by team to achieve focused insights on team-specific schedules

testCases.title: Filter schedule report by valid team
preconditions: User is logged in as a Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule database contains data for multiple teams with assigned activities
At least one team has schedule data available for reporting
Team filter dropdown is populated with valid team options

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with all available filter options including team filter dropdown

steps.action: Click on the team filter dropdown to view available teams
steps.expectedResult: Team filter dropdown expands and displays a list of all available teams with their names

steps.action: Select a valid team from the filter dropdown (e.g., 'Development Team A')
steps.expectedResult: Team filter displays the selected team name, dropdown closes, and the filter is visually indicated as applied

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to create the filtered report
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request with team filter applied and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete (within 5 seconds)
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated and displayed showing schedule data exclusively for the selected team

steps.action: Verify that all activities and schedules displayed belong only to the selected team
steps.expectedResult: Report displays schedule data only for the selected team with no activities from other teams visible

steps.action: Check that resource assignments shown in the report are members of the selected team
steps.expectedResult: All resource assignments and team members listed in the report belong to the selected team

steps.action: Verify the report header or filter summary indicates the team filter is active
steps.expectedResult: Report header or filter summary section clearly shows that the report is filtered by the selected team name

postconditions: Schedule report displays only team-specific data
Team filter remains applied and visible
Report is ready for export or further filtering
No data from other teams is visible in the report
System logs successful team-filtered report generation

testCases.title: Handle invalid team filter input
preconditions: User is logged in as a Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule reporting UI is accessible
Team filter accepts manual input or can be manipulated to test invalid values

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with team filter input field or dropdown

steps.action: Enter an invalid team identifier in the team filter field (e.g., 'INVALID_TEAM_999', special characters, or non-existent team ID)
steps.expectedResult: Invalid team identifier is entered in the filter field

steps.action: Tab out of the field or trigger validation by clicking elsewhere
steps.expectedResult: System displays a validation error message such as 'Invalid team selected' or 'Please select a valid team from the list' near the team filter field

steps.action: Verify the error message is clearly visible and describes the validation issue
steps.expectedResult: Error message is displayed in red or highlighted color, clearly indicating that the team filter input is invalid

steps.action: Attempt to click the 'Generate Report' button with the invalid team filter
steps.expectedResult: Report generation is blocked and the 'Generate Report' button is either disabled or clicking it triggers a validation error message

steps.action: Verify that no report is generated with invalid team filter
steps.expectedResult: No report is displayed, and the system prevents report generation until valid input is provided

steps.action: Clear the invalid team filter input and select a valid team from the dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message disappears, valid team is selected, and the 'Generate Report' button becomes enabled

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' with the valid team filter
steps.expectedResult: Report is successfully generated and displayed with data for the valid team selected

postconditions: Invalid team filter input is rejected by the system
Validation error messages are cleared after valid input is provided
Report generation only proceeds with valid team filter
System maintains data integrity by preventing invalid queries
Error handling is logged appropriately in the system
